TopicTitle: Bug when i try to upload my own craft

Articles.Content:
Hello,
I want to share my craft, i click on the purple steam icon and put all the description, but the message saying " Ksp is connecting with Steam ... " is infinite and nothing is happening after...
Some craft work ( mostly of the time the little ones ) and other don't
PLEASE HELP
I have not seen this happen but I have moved your post to the support sub where someone else might have. Good luck.

On 11/17/2021 at 3:53 PM, Bendo said:

Hello,
I want to share my craft, i click on the purple steam icon and put all the description, but the message saying " Ksp is connecting with Steam ... " is infinite and nothing is happening after...
Some craft work ( mostly of the time the little ones ) and other don't
PLEASE HELP

Do you have some sort of network restrictions?

Also, what's the quality of your connection?

You may be signed out of steam

- You may have internet problems

I remember steam uploading always being annoying, it takes me ages to get connected, so I never use it
